divs: sighting detailsi observed an object approx my size, with more mass, approaching from the north. i am flying a b-757-200 las-jfk redeye. national airlines las-jfk. due to the moonlit night was able to observe from approach. 45 degree approach, 10 miles behind, slow accelleration to abeam wing, 600kts g\s flying formation for about 1 minute, observed windows,other features of a\c,the flying large wedge then accellerated slowly to about 1\2 mile ahead of me and made a 90 degree to the right, followed by a 90 degree to the left pitched up 60 to 90 degrees and dissappeared. i was awaiting the wash there was no wash no prop, no jet, no nothing! the a\c evaporated. co-pilot wanted to make a report to den center of unreported trafick. i said i will do it, den center, do you have trafick in our area?) (no, youre the only ones out there tonite) !!!!!! i state this as fact an can produce the f\o [cms\tg - witness name and identification moved to witness summary box]
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Alamosa
There were no other sightings in Alamosa on or around October 31st 1999
